elements.text:
Agent Skills
takumif@
2026-01-23
elements.translated_text:
Agent 技能
takumif@
2026-01-23

elements.text: What are Agent Skills?
elements.translated_text: 什么是 Agent 技能？

elements.text:
An open format to organize prompts and scripts for reuse and sharing
Agents can proactively read and run skills when relevant
Originally proposed by Anthropic, now also supported by OpenAI and Google
elements.translated_text:
一种用于组织 prompt 和脚本以实现重用和共享的开放格式
Agent 可以在相关时主动读取并运行技能
最初由 Anthropic 提出，现在也受到 OpenAI 和 Google 的支持

elements.text: Anatomy of a skill
elements.translated_text: 技能剖析

elements.text: Each skill has its own directory:
elements.translated_text: 每个技能都有自己的目录：

elements.text:
my-skill/
├── SKILL.md          # Required: instructions + metadata
├── scripts/          # Optional: executable code
├── references/       # Optional: documentation
└── assets/           # Optional: templates, resources
elements.translated_text:
my-skill/
├── SKILL.md          # 必需：指令 + 元数据
├── scripts/          # 可选：可执行代码
├── references/       # 可选：文档
└── assets/           # 可选：模板、资源

elements.text: SKILL.md
elements.translated_text: SKILL.md

elements.text:
---
name: pdf-processing
description: Extract text and tables from PDF files, fill forms, merge documents.
---

# PDF Processing

## When to use this skill
Use this skill when the user needs to work with PDF files...

## How to extract text
1. Use pdfplumber for text extraction...
elements.translated_text:
---
name: pdf-processing
description: 从 PDF 文件中提取文本和表格，填充表单，合并文档。
---

# PDF 处理

## 何时使用此技能
当用户需要处理 PDF 文件时使用此技能...

## 如何提取文本
1. 使用 pdfplumber 进行文本提取...

elements.translated_text: 团队技能注册表

elements.text:

├── create-everest-eval/
├── evalmind/
├── skill-author/
└── ...
elements.translated_text:
//intelligence/agent/skills/  ← Alma 负责此项
├── create-everest-eval/
├── evalmind/
├── skill-author/
└── ...

elements.text: Support status (as of 2026-01-23)

Jetski/Antigravity: Supported
Gemini CLI: Experimental, opt-in
Cider Agent: Not supported yet (b/475841696)
elements.translated_text:
Jetski/Antigravity：已支持
Gemini CLI：实验性，需选择性加入
Cider Agent：尚不支持 (b/475841696)

elements.text: Installing skills
elements.translated_text: 安装技能

elements.text:
If you put skills in these directories, Gemini CLI’s and Jetski’s system instructions will list their names and descriptions:
Gemini CLI
~/.gemini/skills/
<project_root>/.gemini/skills/
Jetski
~/.gemini/jetski/skills/
<project_root>/.agent/skills/
Agents will proactively read and run skills when relevant
You can also give a skill path to Cider Agent and that kinda works
elements.translated_text:
如果你将技能放入这些目录，Gemini CLI 和 Jetski 的系统指令将列出它们的名称和描述：
Gemini CLI
~/.gemini/skills/
<project_root>/.gemini/skills/
Jetski
~/.gemini/jetski/skills/
<project_root>/.agent/skills/
Agent 会在相关时主动读取并运行技能
你也可以向 Cider Agent 提供技能路径，这在某种程度上是可行的

elements.text: Getting started
elements.translated_text: 快速入门

elements.text:
Run setup.sh to copy skills into appropriate directories. Restart Gemini CLI or Jetski.
You can also manually copy skill directories into the directories in the previous slide.
Ask the agent to help you create an Everest eval, and it’ll use the create-everest-eval skill
Go through an automatable task with the agent. Ask it to turn it into a skill, and it’ll use the skill-author skill to do that
Add your skills to //intelligence/agent/skills/!
elements.translated_text:
运行 setup.sh 将技能复制到适当的目录中。重启 Gemini CLI 或 Jetski。
你也可以手动将技能目录复制到上一张幻灯片中的目录中。
请求 Agent 帮助你创建一个 Everest eval，它将使用 create-everest-eval 技能
与 Agent 一起执行一个可自动化的任务。请求它将其转换为一项技能，它将使用 skill-author 技能来完成此操作
将你的技能添加到 //intelligence/agent/skills/！

elements.text: Miscellaneous thoughts
elements.translated_text: 其他想法

elements.text:
Still very early days at Google. No best practices yet
E.g., not sure if scripts should go in my-skill/scripts/ or appropriate google3 directories
Many pieces of info on these slides will likely soon be obsolete
Anything that can be done via scripts and shell commands in theory can be turned into a skill and be automated
E.g., how to write one-off/commandline scripts using certain APIs that you can never remember how to use.
Corollary: When developing a tool, we should make it accessible via scripts and/or the commandline
TODO: Add skills for each I/O format/store: ArrayRecord, RecordIO, SSTable, Google Sheets, CNS, Hydra, Gemini Example, Lamda Example, … so that I can ask things like “convert this ArrayRecord file into a spreadsheet”
elements.translated_text:
在 Google 内部仍处于非常早期的阶段。目前还没有最佳实践
例如，不确定脚本应该放在 my-skill/scripts/ 还是适当的 google3 目录中
这些幻灯片上的许多信息可能很快就会过时
理论上，任何可以通过脚本和 Shell 命令完成的操作都可以转化为技能并实现自动化
例如，如何使用你永远记不住如何调用的某些 API 来编写一次性/命令行脚本。
推论：在开发工具时，我们应该使其可以通过脚本和/或命令行进行访问
待办：为每种 I/O 格式/存储添加技能：ArrayRecord、RecordIO、SSTable、Google Sheets、CNS、Hydra、Gemini Example、Lamda Example……这样我就可以提出类似“将此 ArrayRecord 文件转换为电子表格”的要求
